mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_LC_MAS01_HIST ( MASTER_SEQ ,MASTER_TO_ID ,COM_CODE ,MEMBER_SEQ ,SUB_YN ,PRE_REG_YN ,PL_CLASS ,PL_WORK ,CORP_USER_YN ,CAREER_TYP ,PL_PRODUCT ,PL_REG_STAT ,PL_STAT ,PL_REGIST_NO ,CI ,PL_M_NAME ,PL_M_Z_ID ,PL_M_Z_ID_EDU ,PL_CELLPHONE ,ADDR ,ADDR_DETAIL ,PL_EDU_NO ,CAREER_START_DATE ,CAREER_END_DATE ,ENTRUST_DATE ,PL_MERCHANT_NAME ,PL_CEO_NAME ,PL_MERCHANT_NO ,PL_BUSINESS_NO ,COMP_PHONE_NO ,CORP_FOUND_DATE ,CAPITAL ,VOTING_STOCK_CNT ,COM_CONT_DATE ,COM_REG_DATE ,CHK_YN ,CRE_APP_DATE ,CRE_LICENSE_DATE ,PL_PAY_STAT ,PAY_DATE ,SEND_MSG ,PL_HIST_CD ,PL_HIST_TXT ,COM_HAEJI_DATE ,CRE_HAEJI_DATE ,FILE_SEQ ,REG_TIMESTAMP ,UPD_SEQ ,UPD_TIMESTAMP ) SELECT MASTER_SEQ ,MASTER_TO_ID ,COM_CODE ,MEMBER_SEQ ,SUB_YN ,PRE_REG_YN ,PL_CLASS ,PL_WORK ,CORP_USER_YN ,CAREER_TYP ,PL_PRODUCT ,PL_REG_STAT ,PL_STAT ,PL_REGIST_NO ,CI ,PL_M_NAME ,PL_M_Z_ID ,PL_M_Z_ID_EDU ,PL_CELLPHONE ,ADDR ,ADDR_DETAIL ,PL_EDU_NO ,CAREER_START_DATE ,CAREER_END_DATE ,ENTRUST_DATE ,PL_MERCHANT_NAME ,PL_CEO_NAME ,PL_MERCHANT_NO ,PL_BUSINESS_NO ,COMP_PHONE_NO ,CORP_FOUND_DATE ,CAPITAL ,VOTING_STOCK_CNT ,COM_CONT_DATE ,COM_REG_DATE ,CHK_YN ,CRE_APP_DATE ,CRE_LICENSE_DATE ,PL_PAY_STAT ,PAY_DATE ,SEND_MSG ,PL_HIST_CD ,PL_HIST_TXT ,COM_HAEJI_DATE ,CRE_HAEJI_DATE ,FILE_SEQ ,REG_TIMESTAMP ,UPD_SEQ ,UPD_TIMESTAMP FROM TB_LC_MAS01 WHERE MASTER_SEQ = #{masterSeq}

INSERT INTO TB_LC_MAS01_STEP ( MASTER_SEQ ,PL_REG_STAT ,PL_STAT ,PL_HIST_TXT ,REG_TIMESTAMP ,REG_SEQ ) SELECT MASTER_SEQ ,PL_REG_STAT ,PL_STAT ,CASE WHEN PL_STAT = '4' THEN FN_CD_DTL('DRP001',PL_HIST_CD) WHEN PL_STAT IN ('3','5','6','7','10','11','12') THEN PL_HIST_TXT ELSE '' END AS PL_HIST_TXT ,NOW() ,#{regSeq} FROM TB_LC_MAS01 WHERE MASTER_SEQ = #{masterSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT MASTER_SEQ ,PL_REG_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('REG001',PL_REG_STAT) AS PL_REG_STAT_NM ,PL_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('MAS001',PL_STAT) AS PL_STAT_NM ,PL_HIST_TXT ,TO_CHAR(REG_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_TIMESTAMP ,REG_SEQ ,FN_MEMBER_NAME(REG_SEQ) AS MEMBER_NM FROM TB_LC_MAS01_STEP WHERE MASTER_SEQ = #{masterSeq} ORDER BY MASTER_STEP_SEQ DESC
